name: Hamlet
description: Hamlet; is a exploration, building, crafting, and management game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) Storage: 256 MB available space Sound Card: Required for Sound.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. Storage: 512 MB available space Sound Card: Required for Sound.
